name: reStrike_VTA
description: Windows desktop application for taekwondo referees using Tauri and React

scripts.dev:fast: cd ui && npm run start:fast && cd .. && cargo tauri dev --no-watch
scripts.build:fast: cd ui && npm run build:fast && cd .. && cargo tauri build --release
scripts.clean: cargo clean && cd ui && npm run build -- --clean
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf target ui/build node_modules/.cache && cargo clean && cd ui && npm run clean
scripts.format: cargo fmt && cd ui && npm run format
scripts.optimize: npm run clean:all && npm run build:fast

author: damjanZGB
